document.full_text: china's economy may grow by 9.6 percent in the second quarter of 2011, a government think tank said in a report on wednesday, keeping pace with first quarter growth.
document.title: china growth seen resilient, inflation stubborn
lines_and_colors: china's economy may grow by 9.6 percent in the second quarter of 2011, a government think tank said in a report on wednesday, keeping pace with first quarter growth.
